name: nunatak
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
rock or a mountain that sticks up above the level of an area of ice or snow: C3 is the most southerly nunatak in the Colbert Mountains.
More examplesFewer examples"Nunatak" means "lonely mountain" in Inuit.Nunataks are promontories that project above the surface of a glacier.Certain plants survived glaciation on nunataks.There are several adjacent peaks exactly like this nunatak.
